t: Amazon Is The Most-Trusted Retail Brand According To New Study
s: July 23, 2018 - For this study, survey responses were analyzed and assigned a number in each key dimension. Based on those results, an overall trust score was assigned to each brand. Out of the 10 retailers in this study, approximately 30 percent of respondents selected Amazon as their most trusted brand.
